pages.text: The crucible is the first and likely most important tool of the $(thing)Hermeticist$(). It allows to dissolve objects into their $(thing)Essentia$(), and then use the $(thing)Essentia$() to create other objects.

pages.title: Heating
pages.text: In order to use the crucible, it needs to be filled with water using buckets. The water needs to be brought to a boil, to achieve this. place the crucible on a heate source, such as fire, lava, magma or a lit campfire.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use the crucible to $(italics)create$() matter, one first needs to $(italics)dissolve$() matter to release it's $(thing)Essentia$(). To dissolve an item, simply drop it into the boiling water in the crucible. In order to use the crucible to create new items, stir the boiling $(thing)Essentia$() by right-clicking the crucible with a stick, then drop in the ingredient.
